RACE.RACE_TEXT: Lassie Futurity Trial DELTA DOWNS RACE 1 330 Y Dirt CR: 79. Futurity Trial Purse 10000. FOR TWO YEARS OLD FILLIES, ACCREDITED LOUISIANA BRED QUARTER HORSE FOALS OF 2021, WHICH HAVE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE TO THE LASSIE FUTURITY. $425 Due the day before entry to trials. LATE PAYMENT: $6,000.00 Due the day before entry to trials. Weight s: 124 lbs. (All Final Payments and Supplemental Nominations must be on account with the Horsemen's Bookkeeper prior to NOON the day before entry to trials. Cash or Cashier Check ONLY !)(At the discretion of Delta Downs the trials may be run Wednesday May 3, and Thursday May 4, 2023. If only one day of trials is deemed appropriate the trials will be run on Wednesday May 3, 2023.(*All horses nominated to this race are subject to substance testing (Hair Testing) as outlined by LQHBA refer to www.lqhba.com o r www.deltadownsracing.com).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: G NAH NAH B bumped, solid rally, proved best. TF THAT GIRLS GAME bumped, gamely late. JESSAH CERVZA steady gain. TTT M TWENTY THREE broke out start, speed, weakened late. SPENDING PLAN bumped, even effort. KR EYE OF A STORM mild try. LIL RUNAWAY TRAIN broke out, no real threat. MAGNOLIA PRIZE bumped, drifted in. JEWELS TRAIN bumped early, ducked in gap.

ENTRY.NAME: Ttt M Twenty Three
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out start, speed, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: G Nah Nah B
ENTRY.OWNER: Hebert Gerard and Mendoza Fausto G

ENTRY.NAME: Jewels Train
ENTRY.OWNER: Colomb Jr Lester Loup Raymond R Blackmon Jerry and Two The Max Investments LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Kr Eye of a Storm
ENTRY.OWNER: Kenneth L. Roberts Racing Stables Inc.

JJ EAGLE HY LUCK early leader, weakened late. MS DIAMOND DELUXE mild early try. PERRYSMIDNIGHTCARTER fractious gate, no real threat. HARD NINETY pinched back early, no late kick.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROGUE SOUTHERN LADY speed, held on well. SOUTHERN CHEX broke in start, solid try, held 2nd. ROBBIESDASHINGLEAGLE drifted out, closed fast, missed 2nd. APOLLITICALADY pinched back early, rushed up. WENDELLS FAST DASH bumped start, even try. SAN LORENZAA mild bid. UNGAWA early try, faded. IM FOR MYLES drifted out early, steady fade. TDZ WAVETOTHEQUEEN fractious gate, broke slow, no bid. THE TRAINER OF #6 APOLLITICALADY LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST #7 SOUTHERN CHEX FOR INTERFERENCE AT THE START OF THE RACE. AFTER VIEWING REPLAYS STEWARDS TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Tdz Wavetothequeen
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate, broke slow, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Southern Chex
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in start, solid try, held 2nd
